text: The Alba Party is a Scottish nationalist, pro-independence and socially conservative political party in Scotland. The party was founded by Laurie Flynn, with the former first minister of Scotland Alex Salmond as leader. Salmond created the party's 2021 Scottish Parliament election campaign in March 2021. ==References== Category:21st-century establishments in Scotland Category:2021 establishments in Europe Category:Conservative parties Category:Nationalist organisations in the United Kingdom Category:Political parties in Scotland
title: Alba Party
